name: Rogue Pilot
description:
"Down . . I'm down . . there going to hold me, but I'll escape!!"
"I'm not a pilot, but I'll manage to fly outta here!!!"

You've been captured by the enemy. You manage to escape. Since you are not a trained pilot, you are going to have a difficult time flying these aircraft. Its up to you to inflict maximum damage on the enemy. You have 4 aircraft to choose from. --The fast and powerful Tornado --The sleek and heavily armed Reaper Drone --The classic WW2 War Plane --The Navy Jet Each aircraft has its own special abilities.

Hints : There are BONUS cut scene sequences when you destroy the Battleship and the Nuclear Reactor (White Cooling Tower) Note : **These airplanes have been made intentionally difficult to fly. Please don't complain about bad controls. They are supposed to be bad - this guy is not a pilot. It even includes a fun bailout option when you just can't take any more bogey hunting.

There are 8 challenging missions. The missions get more difficult the higher they get. The goal is to score 15,000 points. You can also try and complete the secondary goals of taking out the battleship and the nuclear power plant.

Each plane is equipped with the latest high tech weapons. Some planes have guns and some have missiles. The game play includes auto fire.

It an ultra realistic flight simulator featuring:
--3D graphics
--Takeoff and Landing
--Lights for aircraft
--Multiple strike targets including buildings, battleships, and tanks
--Fun cutscenes add to the realistic action
--A fun 3D flight sim for all ages
--Escape and Survive
